properties.entry: SELECT NOTICE_ID ,NOTICE_TITLE ,MEMBER_NAME ,CREATE_DATE ,COUNT FROM NOTICE N JOIN MEMBER M ON N.MEMBER_NO = M.MEMBER_NO WHERE N.STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY NOTICE_ID DESC
INSERT INTO NOTICE(NOTICE_ID, NOTICE_TITLE, NOTICE_CONTENT) VALUES(notice_seq.NEXTVAL,?,?)
UPDATE NOTICE SET COUNT = COUNT+1 WHERE NOTICE_ID=? AND STATUS='Y'
SELECT NOTICE_ID ,NOTICE_CONTENT ,MEMBER_NAME ,CREATE_DATE ,COUNT ,CREATE_DATE FROM NOTICE N JOIN MEMBER M ON N.MEMBER_NO = M.MEMBER_NO WHERE NOTICE_ID= ? AND N.STATUS = 'Y'
